definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="wait"><value name="ticks"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><statement name="do"><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="logic_negate"><value name="BOOL"><block type="entity_checkgamemode"><field name="gamemode">CREATIVE</field><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="entity_allow_flying"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><value name="condition"><block type="text_binary_ops"><value name="A"><block type="item_nbt_text_get"><value name="tagName"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">flying</field></block></value><value name="item"><block type="entity_get_armor_slot_item"><value name="slotid"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">3</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></value></block></value><value name="B"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">true</field></block></value></block></value></block></statement></block></statement></block></next></block></xml>
